title: Worked (Dotsplosive)
lyrics: —but you gotta get the hell up outta here
(Seriously, seriously)
God never like ugly
Yo' mama ugly than a motherfucker (Yeah)
Seriously, (Seriously,)
Seriously, (Seriously)
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin'
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin'
Shut the fuck up 'fore I— (God damn!)
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin'
(Ooh)
Work, work, work, all I do is work
I be workin' for a check, I be workin' my nerves
I be workin' for my fans while I'm workin' this verse
I mean, (Ooh)
Sometimes I'm workin' for God
Sometimes I'm workin' for people like twicе as hard
Sometimes I don't wanna be bothеred, so I work
Work reminds me of my father
My girl say I work to run away from my problems
"I'm working on myself" is what I said to my mama
But let's be honest, this shit don't work
We'll all be broke, livin' right back in Compton
Some people work their whole life and still can't have shit
They pass away when work flows in they casket
Niggas is sellin' work, sniffin' work, gettin' worked by the system
Workin' on my ideas trying to stretch (?) visit like
(Ooh)
'Cause I'ma do what the fuck I want to (Ooh)
You tryna' work a nigga what 'chu won't do
(You, got, me fucked up)
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin' (That part, that part)
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin' (That part, that part)
Shut the fuck up 'fore I— (God damn!)
Shut the fuck up when a boss—
She was independent with two jobs when I met her
Workin' hard when I met her
Told me she didn't wanna get involved when I met her
Acting nonchalant on every call when I met her
That's when I had to hit her with that ghetto falsetto like
If you (?) tell me, what you throw it back?
For the energy I pull up hard, where you at
Door closed, took off all her clothes for dessert
Put her arm around my neck and said
"You better put in work" like—
(Ooh)
'Cause I'ma do what the fuck I want to (Ooh)
You tryna' work a nigga what 'chu won't do
(You, got, me fucked up)
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin' (That part, that part)
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin' (That part, that part)
Shut the fuck up 'fore I— (God damn!)
Shut the fuck up when a boss talkin' (That part, that part)
You ain't gotta go home
But you gotta get the hell up outta here
(Seriously, seriously)
God never like ugly
Yo' mama ugly then a motherfucker (Yeah)
Seriously, (Seriously,)
Seriously, (Seriously)
